name: Reindeer Squabble
description:
Reindeer Squabble A HoverGrease Winter Special

Away from the busy streets of the cyberpunk HoverGrease world, and completely unaware of the story that is about to unfold, a group of friends decide to take their differences outside and fight for the title of Best Winter Sharpshooter — Snowball Fight Edition. Enjoy!

Official Website http://reindeersquabble.com/

The Altergaze team wishes you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year! 

Make sure you subscribe to our newsletter on http://hovergrease.com/  for updates and more and keep an eye out for our next alpha-beta releases!
